designs.title: Royal Bridal Lehenga
designs.description: Exquisite royal bridal lehenga crafted with traditional embroidery and zari work. Perfect for your special day with luxurious fabric and intricate detailing.

designs.title: Light Weight Lehenga
designs.description: Comfortable and stylish lightweight lehenga perfect for festivals and celebrations. Features fusion design with modern cuts.

designs.title: Modern Fusion Suit
designs.description: Contemporary fusion suit blending traditional and modern aesthetics. Ideal for casual gatherings and parties.

designs.title: Western Dresses
designs.description: Elegant western dresses custom tailored to your preferences. Available in various styles and sizes.

designs.title: Party Wear Gown
designs.description: Stunning party gown with elegant draping and sophisticated design. Perfect for evening events.

designs.title: Ethnic Anarkali
designs.description: Classic ethnic anarkali with comfortable fit and graceful silhouette. Great for casual celebrations.

designs.title: Designer Blouse
designs.description: Custom designer blouse with intricate patterns and premium fabric. Pairs perfectly with any saree.

designs.title: Bridal Dupatta
designs.description: Beautiful bridal dupatta with exquisite zari and embroidery work. The perfect finishing touch for your bridal ensemble.
